The existence of the Craigslist ad: The expert verified that the screenshots of the ad were real and reconstructed its one-time location on the web.
Duration of the ad: Through reverse-image searches and lack of relevant search results, the expert inferred that the ad was live for less than a day, having been posted and removed on June 1, 2020.
Source of the ad: The expert traced the earliest screenshot of the ad to a post on the message board community Godlike Productions, indicating its origin and dissemination.
Verification of the ad: s removal: The expert found that the URL provided in the reconstructed location of the ad leads to a live page indicating that the post had been flagged for removal, confirming its removal from Craigslist.
